attributes.action: Create subsidised childcare within the HM Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a Member of the HM Forces and a working mum, Earning £1200 a month after cost of housing and council tax. I Want to petition the government to Create subsidised childcare within the Forces. America does it, A parent with two children in most areas pay £1200 on childcare cost alone. How are we meant to pay bills and put food on the table???
